template.title: Short summary of the defect
template.introduced_in: git commit hash or version where the bug first appeared
template.fixed_in: git commit hash or version containing the fix
template.reported_by: person or automation that caught the bug
template.created_at: ISO-8601 timestamp when the bug was logged
template.resolved_at: ISO-8601 timestamp when the bug was closed (null if open)
template.description: Detailed description, reproduction steps, and observed behavior
template.resolution: Summary of the fix or mitigation
links: Optional URLs to PRs, tickets, dashboards

bugs.title: StageInputs silently returned defaults for None keys
bugs.description: Backpressure summaries and tenant isolation stages lost upstream data because StageInputs allowed None/empty keys, causing ctx.inputs.get_from('tenant_audit', None) to return empty defaults.
bugs.resolution: Added key validation guard in StageInputs.get/get_from/require_from, updated documentation, and expanded regression tests to fail fast when invalid keys are used.
